title: Easy peasy chocolate fairy cakes
ingredients: ['150g butter, room temperature', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon instant coffee granules', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '280g plain flour', '50g cocoa powder', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '350ml water']
